message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10000. It's a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $9300 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I can get out of it.
